parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Saves joysticks key mappings into the joysticks.cfg file. Engine add these joysticks to the Joystick Scheme mapping dialog in options controls section.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''saveJoysticks'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[saveJoysticks]];</code>
</value></part></template>
